Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Rare endcap opportunity in new power centre.  Anchored by Loblaws, Independent Grocer, Costco and Lowe’s. Ideal for food, fashion, fitness, hair salon, specialty stores and more. This unit is a shell space ready for tenant fixturing. Nearby tenants include Erin Ridge Physio, Starbucks, Panda Express and DQ.  Site has excellent exposure from St. Albert Trail.

Ideal for food, fashion, fitness, salon, specialty stores and more.  Site has excellent exposure from St. Albert Trail (18,654 VPD).  Nearby tenants include Starbucks, Erin Ridge Physio, Zig Zag Tailor and DQ.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Unit 335/340 Former Love Pizza.  2,479 sq. ft. fixtured end cap unit.  High exposure retail units available in major power centre.  Anchored by Loblaws, Independent Grocer, Costco and Lowe's.  Ideal for restaurant, general retail and professional/service tenants.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Established St. Albert Trail location with exposure to high commuter volumes (40,212 vehicles per day). Nearby retailers include Visions Electronics, Staples, Chapters, Safeway, 7-Eleven, and others. Pylon signage available

Excellent retail or office opportunity located in downtown St. Albert. The Bruin Inn is 4,058 Sqft with an additional 1,140 Sqft mezzanine and patio facing the Sturgeon River. This building has competitive cam and taxes and abundant on site parking. Improvement allowance available.

Excellent retail or office opportunity located in downtown St. Albert. The Bruin Inn is 4,058 Sqft with an additional 1,140 Sqft mezzanine and patio facing the Sturgeon River. This building has competitive cam and taxes and abundant on site parking.

Neighbourhood located site which services downtown St. Albert, Grandin, and the Riel Neighbourhood.  Seeking medical, professional, liquor, cannabis, general retail, convenience store, restaurant, pharmacy and more.  Current tenants on site are a hair salon, bakery, daycare and cafe.  Ample parking and two condominium buildings on site.
